alert.note: Alert for Clay (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 7:10PM EST until January 10 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by rain and snowmelt continues. * WHERE...Portions of south central Kentucky and southeast Kentucky, including the following areas, in south central Kentucky, Laurel, Pulaski and Rockcastle. In southeast Kentucky, Clay, Jackson and Owsley. * WHEN...Until 930 PM EST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 708 PM EST, Excessive runoff from 1 to 2 inches of rainfall that fell earlier continues to cause flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Somerset, London, Mount Vernon, Manchester, McKee, Booneville, Science Hill, Burnside, Wood Creek Lake, Hazel Patch, Hare, Camp Wildcat, Bernstadt, Carmichael, East Bernstadt, Luner, Lamero, Gauley, Mershons and Sand Hill.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
